::Shadow Wing::

She heard the howl of a wolf. "LUNARPINE!" She transformed and flew 
out to where the howl had originated from.  She could see a wolf 
limping long on the ground.  She flew down to make sure it was him 
and not a pred or a regular wolf.

She flew up to him and landed.  She looked at him. "Lunarpine. Oh my 
gosh am I happy to see you. I missed you so..." her voice trailed off 
as she saw how damaged her was.  She wasn't sure if she should get 
mad now or wait until he was in better condition to yell at him. She 
would wait, but just for a little while.

She transformed into bot mode. "So, how was your camping trip?" she 
said with a slight touch of sarcasm. "You know, for a few days of fun 
in the sun, you look a bit worn out.  You feeling OK?"  She knelt 
down and patted his head and scratched his ears.  She saw the mech 
fluid coming out of his mouth. Now she was getting really concerned.
"If you stay in beast mode I can carry to back to the base.  You look 
like you could use a CR chamber pretty badly."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> The wolf stumbled again, mech fluid dripping from his jaw,his 
> internal injuries had reopened. he had to continue. he could 
envision 
> Shadow Wings grief, he could envision the sight of Deathscythe 
> spitting on his spark laughing at Lunarpine for his stupidity. he 
> smelled the air, the smell of past battles was growing stronger, he 
> figured he was inside the Maximal scanning zone, he hoped the Ark 
> could spare a bot to help him back yo the base. he looked to the 
sky, 
> the sky above glittered by the light of the half moon. He looked at 
> the half moon and opened his fluidy jaw.
> 
> "Howwwwwwlllllll"
> 
> He pressed on with the thought of what he'd do when he met up with 
> the Pred that did this to him. "I have your scent monster" the 
words 
> echoed through his mind. The wolf had another reason for survival, 
> revenge.
>
